name: Philadelphia Gay Men's Chorus
accomplishments: Attended the 2024 GALA Choruses festival in Minneapolis
Serve on the Membership Committee, taking meeting minutes, coordinating auditions, and planning social events
Currently in the running for an open Membership Director position

name: BE Prideful Employee Resource Group

name: Elsevier Pride Employee Resource Group
accomplishments: Participated in monthly meetings and activities for Elsevier's LGBTQ+ Employee Resource Group
Starting in June of 2019, served as a co-chair for the ERG
Helped plan monthly meetings, fundraisers, social events, and our annual Pride and National Coming Out Day happy hours in June and October
